title: Cookie Policy
description: Cookie and Data Storage Policy for SS.live, owned by Sudharshan S. It includes rules for using the website, intellectual property rights, disclaimers, and contact details. The document ensures legal compliance and sets user expectations.

children.text: , we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency in how we use cookies and store data. This Cookie and Data Storage Policy explains how we collect, use, and manage cookies and other data storage mechanisms when you visit or interact with our website,

Cookies are small text files stored on your device (computer, tablet, or smartphone) when you visit a website. They help websites function properly, improve user experience, and provide insights into website performance.
We use the following types of cookies on
These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They include cookies that:
- Enable navigation and access to secure areas of the website.
- Remember your preferences, such as language or region.
These cookies collect information about how visitors use the website, such as which pages are visited most often. This data helps us improve the website's performance and user experience.
These cookies enable additional functionality, such as remembering your preferences or login details, to provide a more personalized experience.
We may use third-party cookies for analytics, advertising, or social media integration. These cookies are managed by external providers and are subject to their privacy policies.
Enhance user experience by remembering preferences.
You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect the functionality of the website and limit your experience.
: Go to Settings > Privacy and Security > Cookies and Other Site Data.
: Go to Options > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data.
: Go to Settings > Cookies and Site Permissions > Manage and Delete Cookies.
In addition to cookies, we may use other data storage mechanisms, such as:
: To store data locally on your device for faster access.
: To temporarily store data during your browsing session.
Analytics data to improve website performance.
We may use third-party services, such as Google Analytics, to collect and store data. These services are governed by their own privacy policies, and we recommend reviewing them for more information.
Request access to the data we store about you.
Request deletion of your data, subject to legal and operational requirements.
To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information below.

We may update this Cookie and Data Storage Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the updated effective date. Your continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of the revised policy.
If you have any questions or concerns about this Cookie and Data Storage Policy, please contact
. We are committed to ensuring your privacy and providing a secure browsing experience.

title: Privacy Policy
description: Privacy Policy for SS.live, owned by Sudharshan S. It includes rules for using the website, intellectual property rights, disclaimers, and contact details. The document ensures legal compliance and sets user expectations.

children.text: , your privacy is a top priority. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit or interact with our website,
We may collect the following types of information:
: Name, email address, and other details you provide when contacting us or using our services.
: Information about how you interact with the website, such as IP address, browser type, and pages visited.
: Small data files stored on your device to enhance your browsing experience.
The information we collect is used for:
Responding to your inquiries or requests.
Analyzing website usage to enhance user experience.
Ensuring the security of the website.
We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information:
With service providers who assist in operating the website.
To comply with legal obligations or protect our rights.
You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect your experience on the website.
We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites. Please review their privacy policies before providing any personal information.
